questions.question: Are you a politically exposed person in the above description, or are your immediate family members or close acquaintances a major politically exposed person, such as a high-ranking official, political, government official, military or international organization official?
questions.infoText: FATF Guidance: Politically Exposed Persons (Rec 12 and 22):    1. Foreign politically exposed persons are those who have political/social influence in foreign countries at present or in the past. For example, it means a high-ranking administrator of a foreign government, judicial, national defense, or other government agency, a high-ranking administrator of a major foreign political party, or a manager of a foreign state-owned enterprise.2. Domestic politically exposed persons are those who have political/social influence in the country at present or in the past. For example, a high-ranking administrator of a domestic government, judicial, national defense, or other government agency, a high-ranking administrator of a major domestic political party, or a manager of a foreign state-owned enterprise.3. A politically exposed person  in an international organization means a person who influences an international organization, for example, a director, a clerk or a member of the board of directors, senior management, or a person with equal authority.4. Politically exposed persons in a family relationship refer to parents, siblings, spouses, children, relatives by blood or marriage.5. A person who is closely related to a political person means a person who is socially or professionally related to a political person.
